entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
